ygData.subject: intro -- Gaydari
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi EQ_rainbow, I have been playing EQ for over a year. Started out on Fennin Ro where I have a lvl 37 Cleric, named Anoka.  Then some friends started playing
ygData.messageBody:
Hi EQ_rainbow,

I have been playing EQ for over a year. Started out on Fennin Ro
where
I have a lvl 37 Cleric, named Anoka. Then some friends started
playing on The Nameless, where I've been since this spring. I have
38
Druid there, named Anoka.

Recently, a dear friend has decided he wants to start a gay guild on
The Nameless. Since my 38 druid is already in a guild, and she's
female and I'm male, I decided to start a new male druid for this
guild, named Gaydari.

I love playing druids. =>

Are there any others here that play on The Nameless? We need ten
people to start the guild. My friend wants to call the guild
Nameless
Love, in honor of Oscar Wilde.

Thanks to Joseph J Normandin of Mystic Alliance on Rodcet Nife, who
posted info about this egroup in the alt.games.everquest newsgroup.

XOXOX

PS

my name is David
age: 46
single
bear 5'10" 230# full beard
blue eyes balding

"It's okay to feed the bear. He won't bite, only cuddle."
